name: Keep it Rolling
description:
This is a prototype for an endless runner I came up with. You need to just press space bar the moment you see there's a gap on the hill side to get to another dimension and get your car safely across the cliff.

THere are some bugs. but the game is playable enough to convey the idea.

NOTE: Game is better enjoyed with Audio!!!

Controls:

1. SpaceBar to move to another dimension and cross the cliff

2. You can also use up and down arrows to drive your car a bit but you can do without it
